text: Spencer notes that in Cross' original statement he didn't mention the .22, at the prelim he said the gun was Eric's, and this morning he says it was his. Cross says he was "being selfish" when making previous statements. #StanleyTrial
Why can't people just be allowed to do what the fuck they want without anyone else getting snotty about it? No one is holding a gun to the #gridgirls heads are they?!

"For the first time last night you said it was your gun? Why all those lies?," asked Spencer. "I was selfish at the time. I was thinking only about myself," said Cross. Agrees again that he was trying to break into a vehicle at the neighbouring farm.
